tool_description: Research investments, and follow market news
name: Schwab
title: Schwab

api_list.name: news/get-market-update-details (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Read market update news in details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://schwab.p.rapidapi.com/news/get-market-update-details"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "schwab.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: market/get-reports (Deprecated)
api_list.description:
Get reports about the market
* You need to use .../content/decrypt endpoint to decrypt content returned by Url fields.

api_list.name: market/get-movers (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List recent movers in the market

optional_parameters.name: sectorCusip
optional_parameters.description: The value of Sectors/SectorCusip returned right in this endpoint.

api_list.name: content/decrypt (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Used to decrypt content of Url fields returned in .../market/get-reports endpoint

required_parameters.name: encryptedContent
required_parameters.description: The value of Url fields returned in .../market/get-reports endpoint. Ex : \"Url\": \"LZ9K2mvPqP3WhvDsQw09pWbKJfLyyhO630sWnBlegzL7VYQyVA3Q4RKXGO2x%2F0SdXvXBYRH684q4xUo9H4uubq9KJNvdHRO3KLBxTvnKzaU%3D\"
